channel.title: Potions And Alchemies on
channel.description: Recent content in Potions And Alchemies on

item.description: [[Systems/Identifying Potions|Properties]]: viscous black ashy dust If applied under and around the eyes graysight allows the user to see the outlines of nearby objects.

item.title: The Prime Acid
item.description: [[Systems/Identifying Potions|Properties]]: superfluidic clear grayish flavorless liquid The Prime Acid, known also as oil of blending is a thin superfluidic liquid that does far more than eat away base substance as other acids do.
